message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
I'm interested in the product, but $100 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $85.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. $85 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $95. This is still a good deal for you, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $95, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
